page.title: 04HEALTH ON ST.MARTINS I.O.S.
page.content: On this island because of it's remoteness and small population we do not have any resident medical staff.Butthe Doctor from the main island comes every Wednesday to a surgery in an islanders home.Similarly the District Nurse comes every other Monday to carry out her work with the elderly and young, and to administer treatment.Of course they cannot come over water in an ambulance so instead they have a medical launch called the Santa Warna.First Aid equipment and a stretcher are kept on the island.If we need hospital treatment the Santa Warna takes us to the cottage hospital on the main island,St.Marys. Specialists from the mainland regulary visit this hospital.Sometimes the Doctor cannot cope with a problem so then he sends you to a mainland hospital for further treatment.
